name: Flip-Link
description:
Flip-Link is an original puzzle game with flippy cards. Point and click action, ridiculously rendered in stunning 3D for no good reason! Limitless replayability with procedurally generated puzzles. 

Make the cards the same colour to win, winning 5 matches unlocks the next level of difficulty.

Does it work on mobile? Hell no! After all the time I sunk into making sure the screen resizes nicely it turns out that the  HTML5 build falls over on mobile. I'll add an android build if I can figure it out.

Made during the StopWaitingForGodot game jam created by Terry Cavanagh - this was my first go at Godot.
